person.headline: AI Engineer @ watsonx Orchestrate at IBM
person.location: San Jose, California, United States of America
person.summary:
15 years combined experience using Front End (JavaScript), Backend with MySQL databases. In the past 7 years have been focused on React (React Hooks), Redux, TypeScript, AngularJS and Angular with HTML and CSS.

At my current position with Illumio, actively working on React with Redux Saga to implement new reusable UI components with Hooks. In process of converting JavaScript to TypeScript. 

At my previous position,  worked with AngularJS/Angular2(TypeScript) and Backbone/Marionette to implement Single Page Application on production websites. Using AmCharts to display beautiful pie, bar, line graphs for data visualization. 

Enjoy working on full-stack development. Combine expert programming qualifications with outstanding performance in team building and leadership. In addition, hard working, tentative, detailed with great communication and writing skills.

Recent Accomplishments: 
- Implemented Customer Client interface to manage CDM footer links for SEO with Angular1.x from ground up(HTML, CSS) with Unit Test coverage via Jasmine/Karma. Work closely with UX team via Zeplin to streamline efficient collaboration for projects. Transcoding current Angular1.x code repository to Angular[2,4] with TypeScript.

Server Side Project: Launched referral coupon code feature for model registration. Coupon code used for registered models to monetized. 

Prior Accomplishments:
- Implemented SPA mobile email messaging with AngularJS on Adultfriendfinder.com, it's live.
- Using JavaScript with Backbone.js, Marionette.js and jQuery for SPA front-end development and writing the server-side Perl code for mobile browser email for Cams.com. Email system aka "Message Center" create emails, reply, show photos, create folders, delete folders, move emails to folders, delete all folders and email contents.
- Add 'Save Search' options to allow User to save the search results.
- Use backbone.js/jquery/mustache.js for front-end display for admin tool for reviewing messages. 
- Architect and implemented email system between our client and professional models.

Specialties: JavaScript - AJAX (JSON, XML), jQuery, Java, HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL, Perl, Apache, Action Script 3, Flex 4.6,  MySQL Work Bench (ER), AngularJS, Angular2, TypeScript, AmCharts

positionHistory.title: Senior Staff Full Stack Software Engineer
Member Of Technical Staff
positionHistory.description: As part of the Platform team,  implement new UI React reusable components with the latest React.

positionHistory.title: Software Engineer
positionHistory.description: Implemented Customer Client interface to manage CDM footer links for SEO with Angular1.x from ground up(HTML, CSS) with Unit Test coverage via Jasmine/Karma. Work closely with UX team via Zeplin to streamline efficient collaboration for projects. Transcoding current Angular1.x code repository to Angular[2,4] with TypeScript. Fix and maintain existing client-facing bugs.

positionHistory.title: Lead Senior Software Programmer : JavaScript/Perl/PHP
positionHistory.description:
Lead a team of two engineers to mentor and guide them through a development project cycle. A point of contact for all related technical Cams.com site issues from upper management. 

Responsible for the architect, developing, and implementation of vast projects written in object-oriented PHP/Perl/JavaScript. Work as a Full Stack Developer using JavaScript with Perl/PHP as server side for business logic to return data in JSON or XML formatting. In addition, use MySQL for database data access. Worked closely with front-end and back-end programming.

Accomplishments:
- Design User email database with proper table schemas, wrote email module from ground up to allow third party vendors to send and receive emails between Cams.com models and their Users like ICams.com.  Used Backbone.js with internal admin email message review tool.
- Implemented and Architect new internal Risk Management Fraud tool for Customer Service to approve, deny, log and pull up reports on Credit Card limit applications using MySql, Perl and JavaScript. Used Jquery library: Table Sorter 2.0 and Jquery to make AJAX calls for approval or denial.
- Implemented the pagination with JavaScript/jQuery for cams.com 
- Added stream "Search" feature for cams.com
- Implemented Live Video Streams API with adultfriendfinder.com to access current online streams to viewable by customers in real time. 
- Use JavaScript (Ajax) and DOM manipulation to make asynchronous calls to render current stream category search.

positionHistory.title: Web Developer
positionHistory.description:
Implement front end services using eBay's V4 in house API using Java. Front end services consist of JavaScript, CSS, HTML. At eBay, was required to know Java in order to call the JavaScript and CSS objects for front end manipulation.

Accomplishments:
- Replace DIV with table layouts for contents on my.ebay.com page.
- Fix cross-browser JavaScript/CSS issues

positionHistory.title: Web Developer
positionHistory.description:
Create web pages in a combination of DHTML, JavaScript/DOM, CSS and PHP for cross browser compliance based off of written and/or graphical mockups. Write efficient coding style to comply with Google standards.  Write and organize code using the MVC pattern. In addition, optimize code for bandwidth and latency.
       
Accomplishments:
-Implement new features for internal QA AdSense web tool for  QA engineers to display AdSense Ads from Developer or Production’s environment by choosing AdSense content categories.
-Create new internal web tool from the ground up to display AdSense Ads on static web pages. 
 -Made “Ads by Google” logo for different languages to meet internet internationalization standards with Photoshop CS3.

positionHistory.title: Senior Programmer
positionHistory.description:
Lead programmer in charge of overseeing the entire implementation process for new web site APIs. This includes, but is not limited to, working with project managers and QA analysts, develop and maintain web pages, investigate and resolve bugs, writing code modules to expedite web performance, as well as working with programmers to resolve both front end and back end projects. 

Accomplishments:
-Implemented Google Map APIs on dine.com, with existing code and data schemas.
-Use AJAX for customers to view sites paginated comment links without having to refresh page.
-Lead programmer to add foreign languages to the web sites.

recommendationHistory.caption: January 14, 2020, Huned worked with Luan on the same team
recommendationHistory.description:
Luan is a good team player, and has really good technical and communication skills.
He is always very friendly and very approachable when you need to solve a problem.
He has excellent problem solving skills, and is quick to find a solution when needed.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 14, 2017, Brenden managed Luan directly
recommendationHistory.description: Luan is a great team member, is detailed in his work, and is a quick learner. He asks the right questions when necessary and is a great team player. He has a great ability to bring the team together and is a pleasure to work with. I wouldn't hesitate to work with Luan in the future and any organization would be lucky to have him.

volunteeringExperienceHistory.organizationName: Camp Ronald McDonald for Good Times

company.name: IBM
company.description:
At IBM, we do more than work. We create. We create as technologists, developers, and engineers. We create with our partners. We create with our competitors. If you're searching for ways to make the world work better through technology and infrastructure, software and consulting, then we want to work with you.

We're here to help every creator turn their "what if" into what is. Let's create something that will change everything.
